Detailed Description

This class represents an spot light with a colour, position, direction and a circular frustum.

float Moo::SpotLight::attenuation ( const BoundingBox &  worldSpaceBB  )  const

Calculate attenuation factor from distance of this light to given bounding box (in world space).

Parameters:
worldSpaceBB The bounding box of target object.

void Moo::SpotLight::worldTransform ( const Matrix &  transform  ) 

Transform the the light to worldspace.

The worldTransform of the light must be an orthogonal matrix with uniform scale for the light to scale properly.
